definition: Wu and Yue in the same boat (idiom); fig. cooperation between natural rivals/to collaborate towards a common end/in the same boat together
surname Wu/area comprising southern Jiangsu, northern Zhejiang and Shanghai/name of states in Southern China at different historical periods
generic word for peoples or states of south China or south Asia at different historical periods/abbr. for Vietnam 越南

boat
cross a river in the same boat (idiom); fig. having common interests/obliged to collaborate towards common goals

definition: to support the weak and restrain the strong (idiom); robbing the rich to help the poor
to pledge undying love (idiom); oath of eternal love/to swear by all the Gods
to call sth a cow or a horse (idiom); it doesn't matter what you call it/Insult me if you want, I don't care what you call me.
a just cause enjoys abundant support (idiom); those upholding justice will find help all around
to correct in the evening a fault of the morning (idiom)/to quickly amend one's ways
to bide one's time, waiting for an opportunity to stage a comeback in public life (idiom)
to make known to every household (idiom); to disseminate widely/to shout from the rooftops
cow and famous steed at the same trough (idiom); fig. the common and the great are treated alike
